version_description: Additional icons and splash screens for device compatibility.
We have made some significant improvements to our user interface.
Word search suggestions implemented for definitions, rhymes, sentences and word forms.
Included audio icon for upcoming word pronunciation content.

- Allow multi-line input for translations.
- Text selection enabled for copy/paste of content.
- Minor bug fixes.

- Allow multi-line input for translations.
- Text selection enabled for copy/paste of content.
- Minor bug fixes.
We have significantly improved our section on examples for sentences using given words and phrases. This update will allow you to rate and listen to each sentence.

- Find words faster with our advanced word finder.
- Find answers to crosswords with our new Crossword solver.
- Minor bug fixes.

• New and improved interface.
• Slide Over and Split View multitasking on iPad.
• Swipe back/forth through search history.
• Option to remove ads (with in-app purchase).

NEW: Users who have made an In-App Purchase can now save words to their favorites list.

• Users who have made an In-App Purchase can now save words to their favorites list.
• Easily select recent languages translated to/from English.
• Option/setting to toggle preserving of search text in the search field for subsequent searches.

• Users who have made an In-App Purchase can now save words to their favorites list.
• Easily select recent languages translated to/from English.
• Option/setting to toggle preserving of search text in the search field for subsequent searches.
• Search function for My Favourites list.

• Add notes to saved favorites.
• Clear your search history in Settings.
• Support for new iPhone devices.
• Dark mode now available (for iOS version 13 and above). Go to Settings to toggle.
• Easily list and browse through your search history.
